SELECT p.id AS plan_id, p.budget, p.start_date, p.end_date,
d.id AS day_id, d.day_index, d.title AS day_title, d.plan_date,
pp.id AS place_id, pp.title AS place_title, pp.start_at, pp.end_at, pp.place_name, pp.address, pp.expected_cost, pp.normalized_category, pp.first_image, pp.first_image2
FROM plans p JOIN plan_days d ON p.id = d.plan_id JOIN plan_places pp ON d.id = pp.day_id
WHERE p.id = ( SELECT id FROM plans WHERE user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 1 )
ORDER BY d.day_index ASC, pp.start_at ASC

SELECT p.id AS plan_id, p.budget, p.start_date, p.end_date,
d.id AS day_id, d.day_index, d.title AS day_title, d.plan_date,
pp.id AS place_id, pp.title AS place_title, pp.start_at, pp.end_at, pp.place_name, pp.address, pp.expected_cost, pp.normalized_category, pp.first_image, pp.first_image2, pp.is_Ended
FROM plans p JOIN plan_days d ON p.id = d.plan_id JOIN plan_places pp ON d.id = pp.day_id
WHERE p.id = #{planId}
ORDER BY d.day_index ASC, pp.start_at ASC

SELECT DISTINCT pp.place_name
FROM plans p JOIN plan_days d ON p.id = d.plan_id JOIN plan_places pp ON d.id = pp.day_id
WHERE p.id = ( SELECT id FROM plans WHERE user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 1 )

SELECT p.id AS plan_id, d.day_index FROM plans p LEFT JOIN plan_days d ON p.id = d.plan_id -- AND d.plan_date = DATE '2025-12-19' -- 테스트 AND d.plan_date = CURRENT_DATE WHERE p.user_id = 21 ORDER BY p.id DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT id, user_id, budget, start_date, end_date, created_at, updated_at, is_ended, title FROM plans WHERE user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY created_at DESC

SELECT id, user_id, budget, start_date, end_date, created_at, updated_at, is_ended, title FROM plans WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND (is_ended = false OR is_ended IS NULL) ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT id, user_id, budget, start_date, end_date, created_at, updated_at, is_ended, title FROM plans WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND is_ended = true ORDER BY created_at DESC
SELECT id, user_id, budget, start_date, end_date, created_at, updated_at, is_ended, title FROM plans ORDER BY created_at DESC
